NK106(me)011:1: // rdzogs pa chen po sgyu ma ngal gso'i don khrid yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK106(me)011:2: rgyal chos dri med sgyu ma la btud de //
NK106(me)011:3: chos kun sgyu ma'i tshul nyid gsungs pa'i don //
NK106(me)011:4: nyams su blang phyir bla ma'i man ngag dang //
NK106(me)011:5: mdo dang rgyud don snying po'i dgongs pa bri /
NK106(me)011:6: dang po kho nar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
NK106(me)011:7: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
NK106(me)011:8: stong pa nyid kyi ngang las spyi bor nyi zla
NK106(me)011:9: pad+ma'i steng du rtsa ba'i bla ma la brgyud pa'i
NK106(me)011:10: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa bstims
NK106(me)011:11: pa'i mthar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas bskor
NK106(me)011:12: bar bsams te / yid kyis mchod pa dang bstod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa dang /
NK106(me)011:13: sgyu ma 'byong ba'i gsol ba btab pa'i rjes la /
NK106(me)011:14: snang srid thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du phyam gyis song bar bsams la /
NK106(me)011:15: tha mal gyi zhen rtog skad cig kyang med pa'i ngang de nyid dang ma bral bas /
NK106(me)011:16: phyi snang ba'i ri dang khang bzang dang sa chu
NK106(me)011:17: me rlung nam mkha' la sogs pa thams cad dang
NK106(me)011:18: / nang dgag sgrub kyi rig pa sna tshogs su 'char ba thams cad la /
NK106(me)011:19: 'gro nyal za 'chag smra brjod la sogs pa thams cad rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang /
NK106(me)011:25: sprul pa lta bu'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la ma yengs par bya zhing /
NK106(me)011:28: nyams kyi 'phel 'grib ci la yang sgyu ma'i rol
NK106(me)011:29: par shes pas thug phrad rang grol chen por rtsal
NK106(me)011:31: de'ang nyin dus rmi lam la sogs pa gang bsgoms
NK106(me)011:32: pa'i ngang la skad cig kyang ma yengs pa gces
NK106(me)011:33: so // de'ang dang por bla ma'i rnal 'byor /
NK106(me)011:34: gnyis par snang sems sgyu ma /
NK106(me)011:35: gsum par spro bsdu med pa'i shes pa sor bzhag
NK106(me)011:36: nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang du glod nas bsgom pa
NK106(me)011:37: la 'bad do // thun rjes gang bsgoms pa'i sgyu ma'i ngang nas 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
NK106(me)011:38: mtshan mo g.yas phab ste mig har por mi 'gul bar rlung dal bar bya zhing /
NK106(me)011:39: sems gnad snying nang du a dkar po 'od 'phro ba mthe bong tsam las 'od 'phros pas /
NK106(me)011:40: snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad 'od du zhu tshur
NK106(me)011:41: 'dus a la thim pa'i ngang de nyid du ma
NK106(me)011:42: yengs par bsgoms nas nyal bas rmi lam la sogs
NK106(me)011:43: pa dang por zin pa dang /
NK106(me)011:44: de nas gcig las mang por spel ba dang /
NK106(me)011:45: mang po gcig tu sdud pa dang /
NK106(me)011:46: zhi ba las khro bor bsgyur ba dang /
NK106(me)011:47: lha dang klu la sogs par sprul pa dang /
NK106(me)011:48: skad cig gis bden med du sbyang ba dang /
NK106(me)011:49: skye med 'od gsal du bsre ba rnams rim gyis bya'o //
NK106(me)011:50: 'di rnams thams cad kyi skabs su bla ma la gsol ba gdab pa dang /
NK106(me)011:51: skad cig kyang ma yengs pa dang /
NK106(me)011:52: nyin dus sprul bsgyur la sogs pa'i 'dun pa drag po bya ba ni gnad gal po che'o //
NK106(me)011:53: de ltar goms pa nas sgyu ma'i nyams kyang gong ltar 'char te /
NK106(me)011:54: bden med du shes pa mi 'byung mi srid do //
NK106(me)011:55: de la dgag sgrub dang zhen blo byung na ngos
NK106(me)011:56: bzung la sgyu mar sbyangs pas gegs rang grol du
NK106(me)011:58: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan bde gsal mi rtog pa ngang gis 'char zhing /
NK106(me)011:59: snang ba 'di phyam gyis zang thal du song nas snang dus de nyid sang seng /
NK106(me)011:61: khral khrol du song ba mnyam zhing /
NK106(me)011:62: rig pa ban bun phyad phyod phyal phyal song ste /
NK106(me)011:63: phyi nang bar gsum gcig tu 'dres nas lus kyi 'dzin pa log ste /
NK106(me)011:64: gtad med yangs pa chen po'i ngang la 'bral ba med cing /
NK106(me)011:65: chags sdang dang dgag sgrub ci byung yang dgod 'chor bas sems kyi rgyan du 'char zhing /
NK106(me)011:66: sems gsal dngas mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan las /
NK106(me)011:67: snang ba zang thal du mthong ba'i spyan dang /
NK106(me)011:68: sems shes pa'i mngon shes dang /
NK106(me)011:69: nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)011:70: de ltar chos kun sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du //
NK106(me)011:71: nyams su myong ba gang de bshad pa las //
NK106(me)011:72: byung ba'i dge bas ma lus 'gro ba kun //
NK106(me)011:73: sgyu 'dra'i rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ma lus mtha' yas shog /
NK106(me)011:74: rgya chen don zab sgyu ma snying po'i don //
NK106(me)011:75: 'od gsal sgyu ma zung 'jug gdams pa 'di //
NK106(me)011:76: dri med 'od zer sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK106(me)011:77: gangs ri thod dkar sgyu 'dra'i mgul du bkod //
NK106(me)011:78: phyi rabs skal ldan grol ba don gnyer bas //
NK106(me)011:79: chos tshul 'di la rtag tu nan tan mdzod //
NK106(me)011:80: ma rig sgyu ma'i rab rib dang bral nas //
NK106(me)011:81: ye shes sgyu ma lhun grub gzugs snang 'gyur //
NK106(me)011:82: rdzogs pa chen po sgyu ma ngal gso'i don khrid yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba /
NK106(me)011:83: rgyal sras dri med 'od zer gyis bkod pa rdzogs so //
